about.title: About Us
about.description1: Ibn Zohr School of Health Sciences is a private institution licensed under the supervision of the private vocational training sector, specializing in the training of versatile nurses and highly qualified nursing assistants.
about.description2: The institution believes in the importance of quality education and training in improving the health system, and seeks to contribute to the preparation of qualified, competent human resources committed to professional ethics. The school is keen to supervise and support its students throughout their training path, and to raise their awareness of the importance of the nursing profession and its humanitarian role in serving the community.
